hero.title: Digital Business Solutions
hero.subtitle: Transform your business with our comprehensive suite of digital solutions designed for modern enterprises
hero.sectionDescription: Comprehensive digital transformation solutions tailored for your business needs. From compliance to commerce, we've got you covered.

strategicConsulting.title: Strategic SAP Consulting
strategicConsulting.description: Expert guidance for your SAP transformation journey with strategic planning and business process optimization.

erpImplementation.title: SAP ERP Implementation & Enhancement
erpImplementation.description: Complete SAP ERP implementation and enhancement services tailored to your business needs.

technicalServices.title: SAP Technical Services
technicalServices.description: Professional technical services to keep your SAP systems running at peak performance.

cloudSolutions.title: SAP Cloud Solutions
cloudSolutions.description: Scalable cloud solutions that provide flexibility, security, and cost-effectiveness for your business.

analyticsIntelligence.title: SAP Analytics & Intelligence
analyticsIntelligence.description: Transform your data into actionable insights with advanced analytics and business intelligence solutions.

securityCompliance.title: SAP Security & Compliance
securityCompliance.description: Comprehensive security and compliance solutions to protect your SAP environment and ensure regulatory adherence.

ongoingSupport.title: Ongoing Support & Maintenance
ongoingSupport.description: Continuous support and maintenance services to ensure optimal performance of your SAP systems.

esmAIWork.title: ESM AI Work
esmAIWork.description: Transform your brand communication with an intelligent AI-powered ecosystem. Multi-agent marketing automation platform designed to accelerate workflows and automate content creation.

esmAIR.title: ESM AIR
esmAIR.description: AI-powered decision intelligence assistant that accelerates data-driven decision making through natural language interaction and real-time insights.

esmBudget.title: ESM Budget
esmBudget.description: Corporate Budgeting, Forecasting and Financial Consolidation Solutions. Integrated CPM system that unifies budgeting, forecasting and analytics.

esmCDP.title: ESM CDP
esmCDP.description: Unified Customer Data Platform with smart segmentation and real-time marketing capabilities. Consolidates fragmented data from multiple systems.

esmClick.title: ESM Click
esmClick.description: Corporate Performance Management, Business Intelligence and Reporting Platform. Analyze financial, operational and managerial data on a single interface.

esmCRMSuite.title: ESM CRM Suite
esmCRMSuite.description: Smart Transformation in Customer Experience, Sales and Marketing. Next-generation CRM platform integrating sales, marketing and service.

esmDetailerCRM.title: ESM Detailer CRM
esmDetailerCRM.description: Field Sales Management, Customer Tracking and Digital Engagement Solutions. Manage daily visits, orders and performance processes.

esmGDSN.title: ESM GDSN Data Sync
esmGDSN.description: Global Data Synchronization and Product Information Management Solutions. GS1 GDSN compliant data synchronization platform.

esmInventory.title: ESM Inventory Management
esmInventory.description: Smart Inventory Control, Demand Forecasting and Supply Chain Optimization. AI-powered demand forecasting and automated optimization.

esmLoyalty.title: ESM Loyalty & Engagement Suite
esmLoyalty.description: Loyalty Management, Campaign Automation and Personalized Experience. Digitalize loyalty programs and automate campaign management.

esmQuickPick.title: ESM QuickPick
esmQuickPick.description: Smart Warehouse and Digital Order Picking Solutions. Digitalize order picking, minimize errors and enhance workforce productivity.

esmReplenishment.title: ESM Replenishment
esmReplenishment.description: Automated Stock Replenishment and Demand-Driven Supply Management. AI-driven forecasting for optimal stock levels.

esmSmartFind.title: ESM SmartFind
esmSmartFind.description: AI-Powered On-Site Search Engine and Conversion Optimization. Enhance search experience with AI algorithms and typo tolerance.

esmSyncFlow.title: ESM SyncFlow
esmSyncFlow.description: AI-Powered Order and Inventory Management Solutions. Simplify ordering process, optimize inventory and reduce waste.

esmWorkforce.title: ESM Workforce Management
esmWorkforce.description: Intelligent Scheduling, Optimization and Employee Management Solutions. AI-powered forecasting and shift planning.

additionalServices.description: Our expert team is ready to help you implement the right digital solutions for your business needs. Contact us today to discuss your requirements.
